channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Fan Power Controller2 (FPC2)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Fan Power Controller2 (FPC2)

item.title: CVE-2021-3849|2024-08-03T17:09:09.602Z -- lenovo -- fan%20power%20controller2%20%28fpc2%29
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was discovered in the web interface of the Lenovo Fan Power Controller2 (FPC2) and Lenovo System Management Module (SMM) firmware that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute commands on the SMM and FPC2. SMM2 is not affected.

item.title: CVE-2021-3897|2024-08-03T17:09:09.641Z -- lenovo -- fan%20power%20controller2%20%28fpc2%29
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was discovered in an internal service of the Lenovo Fan Power Controller2 (FPC2) and Lenovo System Management Module (SMM) firmware during an that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute commands on the SMM and FPC2. SMM2 is not affected.
